If you have questions regarding our Privacy Statement, its implementation, failure to adhere to this Privacy Statement and/or our general practices, please contact us at:

440 Lafayette St, Fl 2

If you have questions or concerns regarding this Policy, you should first contact us. We will respond to your request within 30 days. If contacting us does not resolve your complaint, you may raise your complaint with TRUSTe by clicking here, by fax at 415-520-3420, or mail to TRUSTe Safe Harbor Compliance Dept.
